reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and true to size, with a flattering fit that hugs curves in all the right places.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the dress!!
items.body: Love, love , love this dress!! Fit like a glove and looked amazing on!! True to size and the price was great!! Read more
items.author: John and Jen Minichino

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning dress
items.body: SO beautiful! So flattering and pretty I love it. Fit true to size. Wearing it as a bridesmaid dress so very affordable option. Read more
items.author: Delaney Boyd

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!!!
items.body: Wore this dress to a winter wedding and received numerous compliments. It looked just like the pictures and was super comfortable to wear. It is true to size and hugs the curves in all the right places. For reference, I am 5’2”, 120 lbs and purchased a size Small Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, stretchy material
items.body: This dress is really nice for a formal occasion. The fit is also spot on. I am 5’5” 116lbs measurements 32-26-38. I got the small and it fits great. The dress has stretch to it which makes it comfortable. I’ve ordered other style dresses from this company and really like the fit and style. The sleeve are a thick mesh and are long enough to reach my wrists. A similar style of this dress had sleeve that were too short on me but not this one. It’s a good length to wear heels with too! Read more
items.author: Laura R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Bought this dress for my mother and she loved it true to size, the ONLY thing she is 4. 11 and it’s a bit long on her It’s not something that your not able to fix This dress its really beautiful Read more
items.author: JR

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars The Bottom is Sheer and the Slit goes all the Way Up to the Hip
items.body: The fabric on the arms and the legs is sheer, the part on the legs is layered so maybe you won't see anything but I won't take that chance. Also, the fabric feels weird and slightly itchy. The design is beautiful but the photos on the page make it look classier than it actually is, the photos on the Amazon page don't look like it is made of sheer material on the bottom and the photos of the fabric on the page definitely doesn't show the weird texture of the material. The dress size runs a little small, I ordered an X-Large; and even though I was able to get it on the sheer part was right where my 'who ha' is. The slit goes all the way up to the lower part of my hip, along with the sheer material on the bottom it just doesn't seem as classy as the page photos convey and I won't risk wearing this in public. I think it is a beautiful design, and I love the dress look on the page; it gives off the "Corpse Bride" flowy tattered material on her dress in the movie. The reason why I scored it 3 is because the bottom doesn't look sheer on the Amazon page and the material feel is cheaper than what is conveyed on the page in the images. Read more
items.author: Emma Marie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So so nice!!
items.body: Amazing fit very flattering Read more
items.author: meagan leiane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Bought this for my daughter to wear to a wedding. Very cute dress. Alit was a little high, but looked great on her. Would definitely recommend! Great price and quality! Read more
items.author: Jennifer D.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Mermaid Formal Long Sleeve Ruched Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Mermaid Formal Long Sleeve Ruched Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Navy, Wine Red, Royal Blue, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
